title: Motivation Switch
detail_text: <:th_ch0005/>Hey, hey, Nozomi-chan, can you say “Ready, go!”<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Eh? We’re just helping sweep the shrine grounds, we don’t have to turn it into a contest, you know?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>If you say “Ready, go!”, Rin will be more motivated nya!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Fufu, I see. I think I’m the type to get a little bit nervous for stuff like that. You’re amazing, Rin-chan<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Ehehe~, is that so? If someone gives Rin the “Start!” cue, Rin’s “Let’s work hard nya~!” switch will get flipped, and Rin can give it all nya!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>I see…. I think I get it<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Waah! Are you the same, Nozomi-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>For me, when I see you in your “Let’s work hard nya~!” mode, Rin-chan, my motivation switch triggers as well<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>??? So we’re…. not the same?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Fufu. Well, let’s leave it at that…. Here we go, Rin-chan. “Ready, go!”<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Let’s go nya~~~~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
